function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Human-to-human transmission of the SARS-CoV-2 virus","Impact":"Rapid spread of the disease leading to a large number of cases","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict public health interventions and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, quarantine facilities, and public health surveillance systems","People":"General population, travelers, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Large-scale travel movements during the Spring Festival holiday","Impact":"Potential for further spatial spread of the disease due to increased human mobility","Mitigation":"Enforcement of travel restrictions and public health measures, and promotion of social distancing","Technologies":"Travel bans, health screening at transportation hubs, and public awareness campaigns","People":"Travelers, tourists, and local residents","Owner":"Government agencies and transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of vaccine or specific drug treatment for COVID-19","Impact":"Limited options for medical intervention and control of the disease","Mitigation":"Investment in vaccine development, promotion of nonpharmaceutical interventions, and research into treatment options","Technologies":"Vaccine development platforms, drug discovery technologies, and clinical trial management systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and researchers","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, and healthcare organizations"}]}
